data.title: Cases For General Provisions Partnership
data.meta_description:
cases for general provisions partnership - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. 1. Aurelio filed a lawsuit against his brother Eduardo and others alleging they had a joint venture/partnership agreement since 1973 to operate their family's theater businesses. However, Eduardo denied the existence of any partnership. 
2. The key issue is whether Aurelio and Eduardo were actually business partners as Aurelio claims. Aurelio relies on an unsigned, undated document as evidence of the partnership agreement, but this document does not meet the legal requirements under the Civil Code to validly establish a partnership.  
3. The court rules the alleged partnership agreement is void and invalid because the document is not a signed public instrument, as required when immovable property or real rights are contributed to the partnership,
